AFZ.caption: NFT Contract Address
AFZ.doc: The NFT contract address that you will be minting from.
AFZ.name: nft_contract_address

AFa.caption: Name
AFa.doc: The name of the NFT being minted. This cannot be changed after minting, and will be visable when viewing this NFT on NFT marketplaces such as Opensea or Rarible.
AFa.name: nft_name

AFb.caption: Description
AFb.doc: The description of the NFT being minted. This cannot be changed after minting, and will be visable when viewing this NFT on NFT marketplaces such as Opensea or Rarible.
AFb.name: nft_description

AFc.caption: Image
AFc.doc: The image of the NFT being minted. This cannot be changed after minting, and will be visable when viewing this NFT on NFT marketplaces such as Opensea or Rarible.This can be the value of an image uploader, or an IPFS link formatted as: ipfs://<CID>
AFc.name: image_url

AFd.caption: NFT Receiver
AFd.doc: The address that will receive the NFT when it is minted.
AFd.name: nft_receiver
